GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
xen/gntdev: Prevent leaking grants

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 273f6a4f71be12e2ec80a4919837d6e4fa933a04, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit dbe97cff7dd9f0f75c524afdd55ad46be3d15295. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
xen/gntdev: Prevent leaking grants
